description.message: Make webpages pleasing to the eye and return reading to the original intention

focus_message.message: Move the mouse, click to select, click the blank area or the shortcut key ESC to cancel

nextpage_loading.message: The next page is parsed successfully, and the automatic loading starts

copyright.message: This article is generated by circle rendering, all rights reserved

whitelist_rule.message: Match automatically open, a line of a web address or domain name. For example: ranhe.xyz

blacklist_rule.message: If it is enabled by default, matching is forbidden, one URL or domain name per line. For example: ranhe.xyz

ignore_rule.message: In the case of automatic opening, matching is forbidden, one URL or domain name per line. For example: ranhe.xyz

error_msg.message: Data is abnormal, please try again later

init_info.message: The system is initializing, please do not close the window before completion

init_success.message: Circle initialization is complete, enjoy it

init_warn.message: Initialization failed, Circle cannot provide services

init_error.message: Please refresh the current page when connected to the Internet. wrong reason:
